data.message: I'm not sure how I feel about this song. Especially with Beyoncé. This has happened with a few of his albums for me and then they grow on me but I'm not too into this one yet.

replies.message: Listen to the lyrics. All the negativity and setting the bar so high foe himself is hard for him! People saying they want a hard beat and old Em. Then they say he needs to grow up. He can't win. The song is beautiful and pure talent rapping acapella over a piano like that xx
